name: #bonesday Game
description:
The game stars two characters, Jack and Kristina, hunters from Dorset. They are sent on a hunting expedition to a slightly rural town. Unfortunately, they find out that three people have joined them on the expedition as well.
The game takes place in a forest and the characters have to escape the town. Jack and Kristina must rely on themselves and their wits to track down each of the three survivors who are trying to escape. The journey is a lot of fun and very TLC. Check out the latest trailer!
